title: Track Equipment Operating Hours
description: A supervisor needs to log the daily operating hours for a piece of heavy equipment (e.g., a bulldozer) for maintenance tracking.

tasks.description: Identify the piece of equipment in the asset management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct record for the bulldozer.

tasks.description: Read the hour meter on the machine at the end of the day.
tasks.expected_outcome: The supervisor gets the current operating hours from the machine.

tasks.description: Enter the new hour meter reading into the asset's record.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the operating hours, which will be used to trigger preventative maintenance.
